original_text: Now I would remind you, brothers, of the gospel I preached to you, which you received, in which you stand,
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 너희에게 전한 복음을 너희에게 알게 하노니 이는 너희가 받은 것이요 또 그 가운데 선 것이라

sentences.original_text: Now I would remind you, brothers,
sentences.korean_translation: 형제들아, 내가 너희에게 일깨워 주려 하노니,

sentences.original_text: of the gospel I preached to you,
